FalseMap< K > Class Template Reference
[Maps]

Detailed Description

template<typename K>
class lemon::FalseMap< K >

This read-only map assigns false to each key.

Note that 

   FalseMap<K> fm;

is equivalent to 

   ConstMap<K,bool> fm(false);
See also:
TrueMap
ConstMap

#include <lemon/maps.h>
